name: musicwiki
description: MusicWiki is a music streaming platform for 20k users. The users can select songs to listen to. MusicWiki wants to be able to suggest music to its users for a better experience. Currently, the database does not have the data relationships in place to efficiently find suggestions to a user.
main: se driven website will help MusicWiki do just that. This database focuses on creating the proper data relationships to map artist “adjacency” -- namely, finding artists that share some connection by label or song collaboration, or finding songs by album.
author: Daniel Sarran, Kevin Sekuj
